mutants.code:
from bisect import bisect, bisect_left

def calculate_greater_lesser_diff(arr, N):
    output = []
    left = []
    for item in arr:
        i = bisect(left, item)
        output.append(len(left) + i)
        left.insert(i, item)
    right = []
    for (i, item) in enumerate(arr[::-1]):
        j = bisect_left(right, item)
        right.insert(j, item)
        output[-i - 1] = abs(output[-i - 1] - j)
    return output

from bisect import bisect, bisect_left

def calculate_greater_lesser_diff(arr, N):
    output = []
    left = []
    for item in arr:
        i = bisect(left, item)
        output.append(len(left) * i)
        left.insert(i, item)
    right = []
    for (i, item) in enumerate(arr[::-1]):
        j = bisect_left(right, item)
        right.insert(j, item)
        output[-i - 1] = abs(output[-i - 1] - j)
    return output

from bisect import bisect, bisect_left

def calculate_greater_lesser_diff(arr, N):
    output = []
    left = []
    for item in arr:
        i = bisect(left, item)
        output.append(len(left) - i)
        left.insert(i, item)
    right = []
    for (i, item) in enumerate(arr[::-1]):
        j = bisect_left(right, item)
        right.insert(j, item)
        output[-i + 1] = abs(output[-i - 1] - j)
    return output
